Motion Carried.     **OLD BUSINESS:**  Commisioner Peterson has questions regarding any updates within the Police Department, when and where the next Coffee with the Cops will take place and the progress on updating the Civil Service rules and regulations. He will email those to me since Chief Hawley is not in attendance.     **NEW BUSINESS:**  Commissioner Peterson opened for consideration for approval of the Lateral Certification List. **Motion:** Approve the Lateral Certification list as written. **Moved by** Commissioner Williamson, **Seconded by** Commissioner Peterson. Motion Carried.     **MISCELLANEOUS BUSINESS: None**     **ADJOURNMENT:**  Commissioner Williamson declared the meeting adjourned at 7:09PM.        ---    **Return to Minutes / Agenda Directory -** [**Click Here**](http://ci.brier.wa.us/civilservice/index.html) | | |
